reviews.review: Hmm, Biohock series... A mustplay.
Posso dizer que o jogo é excelente, com cenarios fantásticos e muito envolvente. Valeu muito a pena ter comprado ele, mesmo não tendo jogado os dois primeiros!!!
THIS GAME IS SO MUCH FUN AND GOOD GAME
Wow.
over rated to hell lots of pretentious bull crap gameplay is pretty poor but that being said its worth playing
Didn't care much for the first two BioShocks. But the gameplay and story seemed much more polished and fun in Infinite. Plus this is easily one of the best endings I've ever seen in a game.

Trama caprichada e criativa, que surpreende a cada novo capítulo, assim como são as cenas durante e entre os mesmos. O som atingiu um ápice, seja com as músicas originais do jogo ou com os sons ambientes que criam a atmosfera que só é possível entender após experimentar o gameplay em si.
임마법같은 스토리가 예술인 게임

Super Spiel, die Engine ist zwar nicht die neuste, die Grafik ist aber dennoch sehr gut. Die Stroy ist super.... das Ende jedoch verwirrend, was das Spiel aber nicht schlerchter macht. Was ein bisschen stört ist dass man selbst beim niedrigsten Schwierigkeitsgrad schon ab dem 2.- 3. Kapitel teilweise ein ganzes Magazin in die Gegener rasseln muss, also echt extreme Bulletsponges.

Jedoch klare Kaufempfehlung
One of the best game I've ever played!
This is aspecial kind of game that makes you want to play it all in one sitting, and once you are done you question reallity and life as you know it.
ah bem daora

Uno dei miei giochi preferiti, uno dei migliori FPS sul mercato! one of my favourite games, one of the best FPS out there!
Voto personale: 9/10
Best Shooter i played.
Отличны сюжет! Замечательная графика! Игра подойдет как геймерам - хардкорщикам, так и тем, кому интересен сюжет. Это можно оценить на 5+.

Шедевральная игра, обязательна к прохождению.

An incredible plot with an extraordinary ending, stunning graphics, landscapes, cities, everything. I enjoyed this game from beginning to end. Definitely worth it, and I dare to say that this is one of my favourite games of all time. 11/10

This game was well worth the money that I spent on it. The very fact that the entire city was floating in the sky was amazing. The scenery and graphics are gorgeous. The developers outdid themselves. The game flowed well and the story was riveting and involving. I was sad to see it end but the two dlc packs tied it up nicely to the beginning of bioshock 1 so I can't complain too much. I don't want to give any spoilers, so I will stop here. This isn't about the big daddies or the little sisters. And while you may not understand what Columbia (the city in the sky) has to do with Rapture (the underwater city), by the end of the game, I promise it will all makes sense and it is worth the wait. There are a lot of really good plot twists that will blow you away. You won't see them coming but by the time you are done with the game, you will see the story for how good it really is.

Definitely the best Bioshock game in the series. Also the storyline is confusing at the ending, but surely the players will get the story sooner or later after. multiple weapons that you can choose from to fir your play style, vigors (magic abilitys) are great and useful not like some product where you get spammed with all the abilities you have but most of them are useless. Graphic 9 our of 10. Overall rating 9 out of 10, definitely worth the price and the time, though the story is fairly short beating it only with 10 hours of play time.
lots of fun, just started playing but i look forward to more, definitely reccomend for single player action/adventure
BOOKER CATCH. 10/10
Amazing Graphics + 60 FPS

Incredable Story
Stunning Visuals
Great Gameplay
One of my favorite games of all time I highly reccomend you give it a try.

Though this game does use my image in vein i have to say the story behind this beautifully crafted world carried me through to the very end and the season pass at this point is so cheap why wouldnt you throw your money at lord gaben?

love to all,
African Space Jesus

Easy 10/10

Even at its worst moments the game still feels great. Perfection in both story and gameplay.

[h1]At a Glance[/h1]

[b]Pros:[/b]

Excellent story
Great Characters
Beautiful timeless graphics
Lots of different guns/vigors
Soundtrack
Sky-Lines

[b]Cons:[/b]

Repetitive gameplay
Recycled boss battle 

[h1]In Depth[/h1]

The story is constantly engaging especially at the beginning and end of the game. The characters are realistic and you will develop emotional feelings for them whether positive or negative. Furthermore, the atmosphere is immersing and unique and the graphics really capture the game's world. The soundtrack only adds to the games narrative causing you to feel different emotions at just the right times. 

So what about the gameplay? The gameplay isn't this games strong suit. It is fun but gets repetitive simple as that really, by mid-late game you will probably be getting bored with the combat. This is partly because the story is so amazing that you don't want to be bogged down by combat and you constantly are. One of the boss battles in this game is recycled multiple times which is dissapointing and annoying. That said, the rarer enemies are lots of fun to fight and some have a lore of their own: namely the Handyman. Furthermore, there are tons of different guns and vigors and while some are definetly better than others they are all fun to use. The sky-lines are a awesome addition and add a new layer to the combat. The gameplay is good nothing outstanding but not bad either. 

This is one of the best games I have ever played and I reccomend it to everyone. Don't let what I said about the gameplay deter you the story more than makes up for the gameplay's shortcomings. Few games have touched me the way this game has and since playing it I have read all the lore. If you get it I would suggest searching for the Voxophones and taking your time it really adds to the game. Just buy it. 

[h1]9/10[/h1]
It's shit
10 ИЗ 10 ГОСПОДИ!

Simplemente, me encanta. Gran historia y ambientación. No dejaré de rejugarlo una y mil veces.

Определенно, это одна из лучших игр, которые я прошла. 

 Необычный  и увлекательный сюжет, великолепное окружение (все люди такие живые, каждый чем-то занят, интересно даже просто  понаблюдать). Очень понравились различные супер-способности Букера, помощь Элизабет со взломом замков и ее открытия "разрывов". Вообще Элизабет получилась таким...своеобразным, прекрасным и сильным персонажем. И, короче говоря, в игру советую поиграть ОБЯЗАТЕЛЬНО! Это бесспорный шедевр, заслуживающий внимания. 

10/10
el mejor juego del mundo y ya.
На одном дыхании, под конец голова просто кипит.

El mejor juego de la nueva generación (ahora ya pasada generación). Tiene todos los ingredietnes apra ser el mejor juego que he jugado en mucho tiempo: facilidad de manejo (jugabilidad), gran variedad de enemigos y situaciones, escenarios, una coprotagonista de lujo, un apartado técnico absolutamente impresionante, y por encima de todo, una historia atractiva que engancha de principio a fin. Un sobresaliente alto.

Este juego mereceria un analisis muy, pero muy largo, pero como ya sabeis, los mios son cortos y directos. Yendo al grano, Infinite es duda el colofon a una saga excelente de juegos que comenzó por 2007 con el primer Bioshock. Esta entrega sigue teniendo un genial apartado artistico, con una narrativa excelente asi como un transfondo que mezcla lo adulto con lo pararnormal y lo politico. Un shooter en primera persona que es una delicia manejar, con accion a raudales, variedad de posibilidades y un sistema perfeccionado en cuanto a jugabilidad se refiere. Excelente a todos los niveles, si señor. Obra Maestra.

더이상 말할 필요가 없다. 스토리, 게임성, 몰입감 모두 최고. 거기다 여주인 엘리자베스의 매력에 푹 빠진 사람들도 많을 것이다.
그리고 컴스탁은 최종보스라기 보단 오히려 가장 불쌍한 존재가 더 분명하다.
(자세한건 게임의 세계를 보시면 압니다.)  주인공이나 최종보스나 무조건 죽을 운명일수 밖에 없는것과 엘리자베스가 많은 일을 겪으면서 성숙해지는 과정에서 찝찝함을 느꼈다.
그냥 그때 파리로 갔었으면.. 오히려 해피 엔딩이지 않았을까? 꼭 진실을 알 필요는 없다고 본다.
This game is amazing i have it on pc and xbox and finished it about 5 times
바이오쇼크 1편에서 흥미를 잃어버림...

Ich bin mittlerweile nicht mehr leicht von Games zu begeistern bzw. zu überraschen, selbst von denen die ich sehnlichst erwartet habe.

Aber dieses Spiel ist gut, einfach gnadenlos gut. Man hätte das Shooterelement auch weglassen können und es wäre genauso spannend gewesen. 
Obwohl es sich um eine Parallelwelt zu unserer Welt, am Anfang des 20. Jahrhunderts handelt, gibt es eben, teilweise noch nicht mal als zu überspitzt und satirisch ein Abbild dieser Zeit wieder, wie sie wirklich war.
Starker Rassismus, Ultranationalismus und u.a. eine an der amerikanischen Geschichte ausgerichtet Pseudoreligion, mit George Washington als gottgleiche Figur, geben eine bizarre Kulisse für diesen exzellenten Ego-Shooter ab.

Schade dass diese Welt untergegangen ist, oder eben auch nicht!

Had a dream about a dream about a dream about a dream in another dream.

10 / 10 would play again.

Сыграло ли это главную роль в успехе?

Главное сюжет и концовка. И изображены герои, их поступки великолепно.
К сожалению без ДЛС картина будет неполной, но купить их все же нужно.
Левин ушел отдохнуть, надеюсь вернется с перезапуском Системшок и/или продолжением Биошок.

Buy this game, only if you feel you have to play it to complete the series. Or you're a member of the KKK. Or it's on sale for <$10.

Literally the most contrived plot of all times. Nothing you do in-game makes any changes in the ending, or anything else for that matter. The character animations are medoicre. The game is <20 hours, even if you hunt for items. The DLC has achievements, even if you don't own the DLC. The game world suffers from poor fit and finish. Grass popping out of concrete, pillars poking out of steps, etc. It feels like an unfinished game. Probably because of DLC. Also, this game is racist as hell.

To keep this spoiler free, let's just say the ending leaves a lot to be desired. 

It's a shame, because the game has promise. The setting is great. Who doesn't like a floating city? The characters have depth, and Elizibeth is the best follower in any game I have ever played.
The story was good but I felt it was too short and it isn't any fun in replaying the game

Wow, a couple weeks ago I had never played any of the Bioshock series, I got the franchise pack on sale and have now played all 3 of them and they are now some of my favorite games ever. Very fun, very nice visually, I love the atmosphere of the games and will be playing them all through again eventually.

Bioshock Infinite is not a standard FPS as we know it from so many other titles. Yes, the shooting makes up a big part of the play time, but what really makes this game amazing is it's story. Although a bit confusing - especially towards the ending, the story of the main characters De Witt and Elizabeth took me in and made me feel part of this wonderworld. The beautifully designed steampunk world and the classy music support the feeling that the player actually is the main character himself and that he takes part in their reality. The shooting scenes can get a bit repetitive with time because not too many new fighting elements are being added along the storyline, but the rest of the game definitely make up for that. (a big plus for the strong female character Elizabeth and the ending which made me think for quite a while).
One of the best storylines of all time. 10/10
A game that seriously needs to be played by anyone reading this comment, like seriously, go buy it and play it...    now

A série Bioshock sempre mexeu bastante comigo, e o Infinite não foi diferente. Com uma cidade completamente oposta à Rapture, esse jogo traz uma complexa trama científica desafiando a realidade, além de contar com incríveis cenários e personagens cativantes. Por muito tempo lembrarei de Booker, Elizabeth, irmãos Lucette e outros personagens únicos e de como eles levam o jogador para diversas realidades.

Der neueste Teil der Serie ist echt sehr gelungen.
Wenige Verbindungen zu den Vorgängern ohne DLC´s, dennoch geniale und Filmreife Geschichte.

just too awesome, plot, graphics, mechanics, all of it. Buy it and enjoy, there's no reason not to.

This one of my first mind-bending games I've played. I really like how you can explore the area, and you're not just stuck with the set path and story you have to follow, no matter how good it might be. Love the graphics too! Also, the main protagonist's name is freakin' Booker DeWitt! How cool is that?!?

edit, 6 years later: there are many well-crafted games that capture the themes presented with more satisfaction and clarity, have more engaging game-play and pacing, and be more thoroughly engaging overall, than this game. But it's difficult for me to find faults in the visual and audio aesthetics of the world, and even harder to find a game that has better.
 Nostalgia plays a large role in why I come back to this game consistently, but the iconic landmarks, environments, and musical covers delight me every time. I doubt the development team will return to Columbia in their upcoming game (as it's story has been fully told, in my opinion), but seeing more of it and Finkton would have been a dream come true for me

To make myself clear: I didn't hate Infinite, It actually wasn't half bad. But to call it a bioshock game is almost unforgivable.

Many call this game innovative and  I think the contrary, to me at least the game feels like a generic FPS. You can only carry two weapons at a time instead of carying them all, all the weapons lack innovation, and the melee weapon was a simple button press when in the first and second they were seperate weapons you had to equip. Plus a freaking sinper rifle in 1912!? are you kidding me?

Even the sci fi elements lack any interest, the vigors feel generic, most just stun the opponent or are grenades, one just lets you hack machines with no effort. Which brings me to the point that they removed hacking. In the first two you had to go through a mini game to hack machines to fight for you and if failed can deal heavy damage to you. In this you press a button and it fights for you... woo hoo

A lot of people really liked elizabeth but to me she made the game way too easy, when ever I am about to run out of ammo (I used the sniper for everything due to it's one hit kill) she would miraculously find more ammo, I never ran out of ammo. plus her "powers" were usually to summon a weapon or health, far from what I expected from these abilities and the explaination was a complete cop out.

And speaking of the story it is more "lets use theoretical physics so we don't have to explain anything" than actual good writing, the prime example is the fact that Fink stole plasmids from suchong which was fifty years in the future, and the reasoning? The "paralel world mumbo jumbo" I myself think it's a cover up so they could make this game in 1912 but still have it be bioshock because there are plasmids.

And the setting angers me the most. Rapture was the setting for the first two games and was a dark and claustraphobic war torn underwater city where you were fighting for your life to find out why youre there. In this your in a colorful land where the scariest thing is those godforsaken vending machines with faces. *shudders* And speaking of vending machines I usually ignored them becuase if I needed something Elizabeth would get it for me when I need it. I used my money to buy Vigors (Which by the way they completely removed the ADAM system) And my final thing is the fact that there is a sheild in my bioshock game, this isnt borderlands, just no.
Amazing game, amazing story line, amazing plot twist.

Геймплейные функции Элизабет не исчерпываются услаждением наших глаз. Барышня за длительное время своего заточения успела прочесть не одну библиотеку, откуда почерпнула знания об устройстве дверных замков, а посему отпереть закрытую дверь или сейф с сокровищами для нее ничего не стоит. 
Нелишними в схватках оказываются и сверхспособности Элизабет. Девушка умеет открывать дыры в параллельные вселенные, а также извлекать из них предметы высокой стратегической ценности. Мы можем приказать Элизабет поставить «дружественную» турель или создать для нас укрытие. Все это положительно влияет на динамику игры.
Плюсы: потрясающий дизайн; захватывающая атмосфера; интересный сюжет; продуманные образы персонажей; динамичные перестрелки; прекрасная Элизабет.

Лично мое мнение такое.Я считаю эту игру отличной именно из-за своего шедеврального сюжета.И хотя есть люди которые ругают игру мол система прокачки оружия хромает,геимплей на нуле и много спойлеров.Просто не обращайте на это внимания тут очень красивая и приятная для глаза графика,и главное сюжет он просто божественный.Главное не ходить и убивать врагов как думают многие школьники,а искать записки которые вы сможете прослушивать,смотреть на все разрывы ,слушать разговоры и тогда нам откроется отличный многоплановый сюжет,с множеством загадок и разветвлений.вообщем мое мнение эту игру стоит купить она очень хороша.Моя оценка 11из10 из за вот этого сюжета.

I'm a slow player (one a week to twice a month) adn it's taken approximently a year and a half to complete this game and I have to tell you, it was a marvlous play through. The Graphics are stunning (for it's time) the story is wonderful. But to the point if your not someone who plays games for the story you may not quite enjoy this game for all it's cracked up to be or you may gane a liking for stroy driven games all toghether. To those of u whom grasp the stroy portion of games (read the books listen it on dialoge) you will find compation in living for another day to play a game with a story as good as this.

I'll be totally honest I bought this cheap without playing Bioshock or Bioshock 2, which I've since bought but yet to play. I absolutely loved the atmosphere of this game the cool steampunk theme was pretty sweet and the story was awesome if not a little mind boggling at the end. The combat however was very repetitive and I've heard is the worse of the three Bioshock games but still worth a play in my opinion even if it's just for the sick views.

Awesome story and fabulous concept!

In a word, Bioshock Infinite is beautiful. No other city has ever fascinated me quite as much as Rapture, but Columbia is the next best thing to lose yourself in. Although the atmosphere of the game loses much of its characteristic intensity in the change of scenery from underwater to up in the sky, going from an action game with a touch of horror to full-on adventurous action is not as disappointing as it is refreshing. The storyline is very compelling in its twists and turns will certainly give you food for thought. I personally do not care for the change in gameplay and mostly find Elizabeth distracting in her attempts to help Booker but have to commend the way her character develops according to the player’s choices. As for the DLCs, while I found part 1 of Burial at Sea absolutely brilliant and essential to my overall understanding of the Bioshock series, part 2 was slightly disappointing, even though the stealth was surprisingly enjoyable.

convoluted plot, got it on a sale, has good water reflections and texture, but the combat interaction between booker and Elizabeth was removed other than summoning things that do little to change the battle. 

Its worth atleast 15 bucks tops if you ever plan on buying it. 

The universal constants could of been more interesting plot line but it gets rediculous at the end and face various spoilerific plotholes. the remodeling the characters went under was mostly asked by outsiders who dont even play games, sort of got rid of the old visual charm. Tying all the stories together is a minefield while combat felt forced and very linear.

Bioshock 2's Minervas den has better plot, and even then thats a dlc. Worth the price if you want a story that has to do with the original bioshocks and not some multiworld offshoot.
